page.title: 16HOUSING
page.content: THERE ARE MANY TYPES OF HOUSES IN OUR AREA.AROUND THE DIGHTY BURN ARE COTTAGES WHITCH ARE KNOWN AS CRAIGMILL COTTAGES.THESE HAVE BEEN BOUGHT AND MODERNISED AND OTHERS ARE RENTED TO PEOPLE WORKING IN AND AROUND DUNDEE.ALL THESE COTTAGES NOW HAVE BATHROOMS,KITCHEN FACILITIES AND MANY HAVE EXTENDED OUT THE BACK OR UP IN THE ATTIC GIVING MORE LIVING AND BEDROOM ACCOMODATION. THE TILE HOUSES NEAR ROSE MILL ARE SO CALLED BECAUSE OF THE TILES ON THE ROOFS. THESE WERE MILL OR QUARRY WARKERS HOMES BUT HAVE NOW BEEN BOUGHT PRIUATELY.NEW BUNGALOWS ARE BEING BUILT IN THE VILLAGE,ALSO ON GROUND FARMERS ARE SELLING FOR PRIVATE USE. SOME OF THE LARGE MILL HOUSES ARE BEING USED BY THE HOSPITAL OR AS PRIVATE DWELLING HOUSES.
